allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Configure CI to stress test only stress_multi_reader_throughput 100k times

This commit modifies the CI workflows to focus exclusively on detecting
failures in the stress_multi_reader_throughput test case:

- Build workflows now only build sintra_ipc_rings_tests_release target
- Stress test workflows run stress_multi_reader_throughput 100,000 times
  (increased from 10 repetitions)
- Applied to all platforms: macOS, Linux, and Windows

This focused testing strategy will help identify non-deterministic failures
in the multi-reader throughput test after reverting the eviction-related
commits.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
